DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Bone marrow treat remove certain white blood cell may able replace immune cell destroy chemotherapy radiation therapy , may reduce chance develop graft-versus-host disease follow bone marrow transplantation . PURPOSE : Phase IV trial study incidence graft-versus-host disease patient hematologic cancer undergo bone marrow transplantation donor .
DOC.brief_title: Bone Marrow Transplantation Treating Patients With Hematologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate incidence acute graft versus host disease patient undergoing transplantation unrelated relate match mismatch antigen donor . II . Evaluate rapidity engraftment CD4 count recovery post-transplantation patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive total body irradiation ( TBI ) three two time day day -8 -5 . Following TBI , patient receive thiotepa IV 4 hour daily day -4 -3 plus cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour daily day -2 -1 . Antithymocyte globulin administer IV least 4 hour day -4 -1 . Patients undergo allogenic bone marrow transplantation day 0 . Bone marrow harvest patient 's donor , deplete T-cells , infuse . Patients receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously begin day 4 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 26-45 patient accrue study within 3-4 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically proven malignancy condition follow type : Acute myelogenous leukemia ( M5 M6 ) lymphocytic leukemia first great remission early relapse OR Chronic myelogenous leukemia OR Myelodysplastic syndrome OR Aggressive refractory nonHodgkin 's lymphoma OR Aggressive refractory Hodgkin 's disease OR Multiple myeloma early relapse conventional chemotherapy reduce tumor mass OR High risk chronic lymphocytic leukemia OR Aplastic anemia HLAmatched 1 antigen mismatch ( related unrelated ) available donor PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 50 Performance status : Karnofsky 70100 % Life expectancy : Greater 8 week Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Bilirubin le 2 mg/dL SGOT le 4 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Renal : Creatinine le 2 time ULN OR Creatinine clearance great 60 mL/min Cardiovascular : LVEF least 50 % MUGA Pulmonary : DLCO least 50 % Other : HIV negative No active extramedullary disease Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
